metadata.title: CVE-2017-15365 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: sql/event_data_objects.cc in MariaDB before 10.1.30 and 10.2.x before10.2.10 and Percona XtraDB Cluster before 5.6.37-26.21-3 and 5.7.x before5.7.19-29.22-3 allows remote authenticated users with SQL access to bypassintended access restrictions and replicate data definition language (DDL)statements to cluster nodes by leveraging incorrect ordering of DDLreplication and ACL checking.

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
percona-server-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
